page.title: 07COLWYN BAY HOLIDAY RESORT
page.content: Colwyn Bay is called "The Heart of the North Wales Coast". The town has many attractions such as the beach, the Mountain Zoo and Eirias Park. When it is raining there is the Leisure Centre the Astra Cinema, Puppet Theatre and Prince of Wales Theatre. As well as being a holiday resort, it is also a good centre for touring. There are many interesting places to visit like Snowdonia, Bodnant Gardens and Portmeirion. Colwyn Bay is easily accessible. It has a main line railway station. The new Expressway (A55) was opened earlier this year. Colwyn Bay is advertised as a family holiday resort on commercial radio, Granada TV and in magazines.Most of our visitors come from Merseyside,the Midlands and Scotland.More visitors are coming now from abroad,mainly Holland and Germany
